mapper.select: select param0 orderNo, a.channel_type channelType, concat(a.id) id, concat(a.logic_org_id) orgId, CONCAT(IFNULL(a.addr,''),a.name) name, a.del_flag type, concat(a.outer_id) src, b.name orgName, concat('rtmp://192.168.128.31/live/ch',a.ch_no) local_src, CONCAT('/static_modules/channel/',tc.icon_skin) iconSkin, td.sn, a.ch_no chNo, a.play_url0, a.play_url1, a.play_url2 from t_channel a LEFT JOIN t_code tc on tc.id = a.channel_type and tc.type_id = a.type_id inner join (select * from t_org where type = 5) b on a.logic_org_id = b.id inner join t_device td on a.dev_id = td.id where a.ch_type =1 and a.type_id = 9 and a.del_flag= 0 and a.logic_org_id =#{orgId} ORDER BY param0

SELECT count(b.id) total, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN b.not_use = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) useTotal from t_device b INNER JOIN t_org c on b.org_id = c.id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = c.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id where b.dev_type = #{devType} and c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%') and ub.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT count(tc.id) total, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN tc.not_use = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) useTotal from t_device b inner join t_channel tc on tc.dev_id = b.id INNER JOIN t_org c on b.org_id = c.id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = c.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id where tc.channel_type in (${devType}) and tc.type_id = #{typeId} and c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%') and ub.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT tc.name, tc.id type, count(b.id) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN b.not_use = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS useTotal from t_device b INNER JOIN t_org c on b.org_id = c.id left join t_code tc on tc.id=b.dev_type and b.type_id = tc.type_id where c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%') and b.dev_type in (162,168,169,172) group by b.dev_type
UNION All
select tc.name, tc.ch_type type, count(tc.id) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN tc.not_use = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS useTotal from t_channel tc inner join t_org o on o.id = tc.logic_org_id left join t_code co on co.id = tc.ch_type and co.type_id = tc.type_id where o.parent_ids like CONCAT('%',#{orgId},'%') and tc.channel_type in (220,2,3) and tc.type_id in (4,9) group by ch_type

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 162 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "door", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 168 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "smoke", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 172 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "wather", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 169 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "temperature", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 240 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "dianbiao", IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN e.dev_type = 241 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS "dianliu"
from t_alarm_log a INNER JOIN t_channel b on a.ch_id = b.id INNER JOIN t_device e on e.id = b.dev_id INNER JOIN t_org d on e.org_id = d.id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = d.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id
ub.user_id =#{userId}
AND d.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%')
and a.occur_time >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y-%m-%d')

SELECT sum(case WHEN tr.real_value = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS useTotal, count(*) total from t_device a inner join t_device_detail b on a.id = b.id left join t_org c on c.id = a.org_id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = c.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id left join t_channel tc on tc.dev_id = a.id left join t_real_data tr on tr.id = tc.id
ub.user_id =#{userId} and a.dev_type = 162 and tc.ch_type= 5 and tc.type_id = 2
AND c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%')

SELECT IFNULL(a.addr,'正大门') addr, c.name orgName, tr.real_time updateDate, DATE_FORMAT(tr.real_time,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') startTime from t_device a inner join t_device_detail b on a.id = b.id left join t_org c on c.id = a.org_id left join t_channel tc on tc.dev_id = a.id left JOIN t_real_data tr on tr.id = tc.id left join pdf_org po on po.t_org_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = po.bureau_id
ub.user_id =#{userId} and a.dev_type = 162 and tc.ch_type= 5 and tc.type_id = 2
AND c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%')

select FORMAT((max(b.real_value)-param2)/param1,param0) real_value, c.name orgName from t_device td INNER JOIN t_channel a on td.id=a.dev_id INNER JOIN (SELECT * from t_real_data ORDER BY real_value desc) b on a.id = b.id INNER JOIN t_org c on c.id = td.org_id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = c.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id
ub.user_id =#{userId}
AND c.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%')
and a.ch_type =#{chType} and c.type = 5 and td.dev_type = 169 GROUP BY c.id order by FORMAT((max(b.real_value)-param2)/param1,param0),c.id limit 0,5

select DATE_FORMAT(#{timeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 172 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS yangan, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 162 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS menjin, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 169 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS wendu, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 240 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS dianbiao, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 241 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS dianliu, IFNULL(sum(case when a.dev_type = 168 then 1 ELSE 0 END),0) AS shuijin from t_device a INNER JOIN t_channel b on a.id =b.dev_id INNER JOIN t_alarm_log c on c.ch_id = b.id INNER JOIN t_org d on d.id = a.org_id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = d.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id where DATE_FORMAT(occur_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{timeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND d.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%') and ub.user_id = #{userId}

select a.id, a.parent_id AS parentId, a.name, e.name AS parentName, a.type, b.ch_type AS devType, c.occur_time AS occurTime, d.proc_time AS procTime from t_org a LEFT JOIN t_channel b on a.id = b.logic_org_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_alarm_log where status != 3) c on c.ch_id = b.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from t_fault_log where status != 3) d on c.ch_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_org e on e.id = a.parent_id
and a.type = 5
AND a.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%')
ORDER BY a.type

SELECT concat(o.id) id, o.name ,o.parent_id parentId,t.name parentName,t.type parentType,
(select FORMAT((MAX(c.real_value)-param2)/param1,param0) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 162 and ch_type = 5) doorValue,
(select MAX(c.warn) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 162) doorWarn,
(select MAX(c.warn) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 172) smokeWarn,
(select FORMAT((MAX(c.real_value)-param2)/param1,param0) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 169 and ch_type = 101) wenduValue,
(select MAX(c.warn) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 169 and ch_type = 101) wenduWarn,
(select FORMAT((MAX(c.real_value)-param2)/param1,param0) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 169 and ch_type = 102) shiduValue,
(select MAX(c.warn) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and a.dev_type = 169 and ch_type = 102) shiduVarn,
(select MAX(c.warn) from t_device a left JOIN t_channel b on b.dev_id = a.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data c on c.id = b.id where a.org_id = o.id and (a.dev_type in(162,172) or (a.dev_type=169 and b.ch_type in(101,102)))) allVarn
from t_org o inner join t_org t on t.id = o.parent_id inner join pdf_org p on p.t_org_id = o.id inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = p.bureau_id where ub.user_id = #{userId} and o.type = 5 AND o.parent_ids LIKE concat('%',#{orgId},'%') ORDER BY o.parent_id
select code orgId, CONCAT(id) id, name, concat(parent_id) parentId, type from t_org o where code like '1035%' and type in (2,3,4) order by type

select concat(o.id) id, concat(po.bureau_id) pId, o.name, o.type, o.code, u.name userName, u.mobile, po.address, o.coords_x coordsX, o.coords_y coordsY,
IFNULL(m.real_value,'') status, 0 warn, 0 chId
from pdf_org po inner join t_org o on po.t_org_id = o.id left join pdf_principal pp on pp.pdf_id = o.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = pp.user_id inner JOIN sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = po.bureau_id left join (select r.real_value,d.org_id from t_device d left join t_channel c on c.dev_id = d.id LEFT JOIN t_real_data r on r.id = c.id where d.dev_type= 184 and c.ch_no = 24 having 1) m on m.org_id = o.id
ub.user_id = #{userId}
and po.bureau_id = #{bureauId}
and o.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
GROUP BY o.id order by o.create_date desc
select concat(eb.id) id, concat(eb.parent_id) pId, eb.name, eb.type, eb.code, 1 status from pdf_electricity_bureau eb where eb.id in (${pIds})

select u.id, parent_id parentId, name, code, type, case when e.bureau_id is null then 0 else 1 end state
from ( select * from pdf_electricity_bureau where FIND_IN_SET(id,(select GROUP_CONCAT(eb.parent_ids,eb.id) from pdf_electricity_bureau eb inner join sys_user_bureau ub on ub.bureau_id = eb.id where ub.user_id = #{userId})) ) u LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_user_bureau where user_id = #{userId}) e on e.bureau_id = u.id
